text: Göztepe Pier () is a passenger ferry terminal in west Konak, İzmir, on the Gulf of İzmir. Located along the Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard, it is among the smallest ferry piers in İzmir, along with Bayraklı Pier. İzdeniz operates frequent commuter ferry service to Karşıyaka, Alsancak, Konak and Üçkuyular. Göztepe Pier was built in 1884 by the first public ferry company in İzmir, Hamidiyye. Connection to ESHOT Bus service on Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard is available, along with tram service at Güzelyalı station. ==Connections== ESHOT operates city bus service on Mustafa Kemal Coastal Boulevard. {| class="toccolours" border="1" cellpadding="3" style="border-collapse:collapse" |+ ESHOT Bus service |- style="background:lightblue;" !Route Number !Stop !Route !Location |- |12 |Güzelyalı |F.
